title: Elon Muskâ€™s Twitter Did Not Perform at Its Best on Election Day
description: False narratives about voting in the midterm elections proliferated on the platform, which has shed half its employees since Mr. Musk bought the company last month.
dc:creator: Tiffany Hsu
media:credit: Ilana Panich-Linsman for The New York Times
media:description: Misinformation about voting machines in Maricopa County, Ariz., spread on Twitter on Tuesday.
